class.name: CanvasItem
class.description: Base class of anything 2D. Canvas items are laid out in a tree and children inherit and extend the transform of their parent. CanvasItem is extended by [Control], for anything GUI related, and by [Node2D] for anything 2D engine related. Any CanvasItem can draw. For this, the "update" function must be called, then NOTIFICATION_DRAW will be received on idle time to request redraw. Because of this, canvas items don't need to be redraw on every frame, improving the performance significantly. Several functions for drawing on the CanvasItem are provided (see draw_* functions). They can only be used inside the notification, signal or _draw() overrides function, though. Canvas items are draw in tree order. By default, children are on top of their parents so a root CanvasItem will be drawn behind everything (this can be changed per item though). Canvas items can also be hidden (hiding also their subtree). They provide many means for changing standard parameters such as opacity (for it and the subtree) and self opacity, blend mode. Ultimately, a transform notification can be requested, which will notify the node that its global position changed in case the parent tree changed.

method.name: _draw
method.description: Called (if exists) to draw the canvas item.

method.name: draw_char
method.description: Draws a string character using a custom font. Returns the advance, depending on the char width and kerning with an optional next char.

method.name: draw_circle
method.description: Draws a colored circle.

method.name: draw_colored_polygon
method.description: Draws a colored polygon of any amount of points, convex or concave.

method.name: draw_line
method.description: Draws a line from a 2D point to another, with a given color and width. It can be optionally antialiased.

method.name: draw_multiline
method.description: Draws multiple, parallel lines with a uniform [code]color[/code] and [code]width[/code] and optional antialiasing.

method.name: draw_multiline_colors
method.description: Draws multiple, parallel lines with a uniform [code]width[/code], segment-by-segment coloring, and optional antialiasing. Colors assigned to line segments match by index between [code]points[/code] and [code]colors[/code].

method.name: draw_polygon
method.description: Draws a polygon of any amount of points, convex or concave.

method.name: draw_polyline
method.description: Draws interconnected line segments with a uniform [code]color[/code] and [code]width[/code] and optional antialiasing.

method.name: draw_polyline_colors
method.description: Draws interconnected line segments with a uniform [code]width[/code], segment-by-segment coloring, and optional antialiasing. Colors assigned to line segments match by index between [code]points[/code] and [code]colors[/code].

method.name: draw_primitive
method.description: Draws a custom primitive, 1 point for a point, 2 points for a line, 3 points for a triangle and 4 points for a quad.

method.name: draw_rect
method.description: Draws a colored rectangle.

method.name: draw_set_transform
method.description: Sets a custom transform for drawing via components. Anything drawn afterwards will be transformed by this.

method.name: draw_set_transform_matrix
method.description: Sets a custom transform for drawing via matrix. Anything drawn afterwards will be transformed by this.

method.name: draw_string
method.description: Draws a string using a custom font.

method.name: draw_style_box
method.description: Draws a styled rectangle.

method.name: draw_texture
method.description: Draws a texture at a given position.

method.name: draw_texture_rect
method.description: Draws a textured rectangle at a given position, optionally modulated by a color. Transpose swaps the x and y coordinates when reading the texture.

method.name: draw_texture_rect_region
method.description: Draws a textured rectangle region at a given position, optionally modulated by a color. Transpose swaps the x and y coordinates when reading the texture.

method.name: get_canvas
method.description: Return the [RID] of the [World2D] canvas where this item is in.

method.name: get_canvas_item
method.description: Return the canvas item RID used by [VisualServer] for this item.

method.name: get_canvas_transform
method.description: Get the transform matrix of this item's canvas.

method.name: get_global_mouse_position
method.description: Get the global position of the mouse.

method.name: get_global_transform
method.description: Get the global transform matrix of this item.

method.name: get_global_transform_with_canvas
method.description: Get the global transform matrix of this item in relation to the canvas.

method.name: get_local_mouse_position
method.description: Get the mouse position relative to this item's position.

method.name: get_transform
method.description: Get the transform matrix of this item.

method.name: get_viewport_rect
method.description: Get the viewport's boundaries as a [Rect2].

method.name: get_viewport_transform
method.description: Get this item's transform in relation to the viewport.

method.name: get_world_2d
method.description: Get the [World2D] where this item is in.

method.name: hide
method.description: Hide the CanvasItem currently visible.

method.name: is_local_transform_notification_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if local transform notifications are communicated to children.

method.name: is_set_as_toplevel
method.description: Return if set as toplevel. See [method set_as_toplevel].

method.name: is_transform_notification_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if global transform notifications are communicated to children.

method.name: is_visible_in_tree
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the node is in the [SceneTree] and is visible on-screen.

method.name: make_canvas_position_local
method.description: Assigns [code]screen_point[/code] as this node's new local transform.

method.name: make_input_local
method.description: Transformations issued by [code]event[/code]'s inputs are applied in local space instead of global space.

method.name: set_as_toplevel
method.description: Sets as top level. This means that it will not inherit transform from parent canvas items.

method.name: set_notify_local_transform
method.description: If [code]enable[/code] is [code]true[/code], children will be updated with local transform data.

method.name: set_notify_transform
method.description: If [code]enable[/code] is [code]true[/code], children will be updated with global transform data.

method.name: show
method.description: Show the CanvasItem currently hidden.

method.name: update
method.description: Queue the CanvasItem for update. [code]NOTIFICATION_DRAW[/code] will be called on idle time to request redraw.

The color applied to textures on this [code]CanvasItem[/code]. This is not inherited by children [code]CanvasItem[/code]s. Default value: [code]Color(1, 1, 1, 1)[/code] (opaque "white")..

If [code]true[/code] this [code]CanvasItem[/code] is drawn. Default value: [code]true[/code].

signal.name: draw
signal.description: Emitted when the CanvasItem must redraw. This can only be connected realtime, as deferred will not allow drawing.

signal.name: item_rect_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the item rect has changed.
